price: Aheman a εwͻ hͻ daa a nsubͻnten nenam aseε no, emu na wͻbεtena afe bͻͻ. Ɛno ne wͻn a wͻyεε kronkron no akatua.
arabic: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: jannātu ʿadnin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wadhālika jazāu man tazakkā
